title: (x) PG Movie Rating font - custom characters {Patricia}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is?   
There may be 2 fonts- the letters of "PG" and then the "Parental Guidance"   
go to site [http://www.mpaa.org/movieratings/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100345/http:/www.mpaa.org/movieratings/)
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Scully, this has come up several times before. When you know   
what you're looking for, it's always handy to first do a [search](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100345/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/search.pl). ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307100345im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
BTW These are custom designed characters, not a font.
